## Total Overdose Deaths in the U.S. (1999-2020)
Overdose deaths defined by the following ICD-10 Underlying Cause of Death (UCOD) codes:

## Top 10 ICD-10 Codes (1999-2020)
See [`results/top_icd-10_tables`](https://github.com/carol-xu4/mortality/tree/main/results/top_icd-10_tables) for top 20 ICD-10 codes in each year.

| Rank | Code  | Description                                    |
|------|-------|------------------------------------------------|
| 1    | T509  | Other and unspecified drugs/medicaments        |
| 2    | X42   | Accidental poisoning by narcotics/psychodysleptics |
| 3    | X44   | Accidental poisoning by other/unspecified drugs|
| 4    | T404  | Poisoning by other opioids                     |
| 5    | T402  | Poisoning by other opioids (unspecified)       |
| 6    | T405  | Poisoning by cocaine                           |
| 7    | T401  | Poisoning by heroin                            |
| 8    | F191  | Mental/behavioral disorders due to multiple drug use |
| 9    | T424  | Poisoning by benzodiazepines                   |
| 10   | T436  | Poisoning by psychostimulants (e.g., meth)     |

This summary is not a unique number of deaths; Number of occurrences includes duplicates, for death certificates with multiple ICD-10 codes.
